Failed to save logcat to destination
Saves a snapshot of the logcat only for this app\'s PID

Handling of flags on CALL/RET opcodes

0 : Treats CALL/RET as if it never needed flags (faster, unstable)
1 : Most RET will need flags, most CALLS will not
2 : All CALL/RET will need flags (slower)
Use of Float/Double for x87 emulation

Dynarec building BigBlock

0 : Don\'t try to build block as big as possible
1 : Build Dynarec block as big as possible
2 : Build Dynarec block bigger (continue when block overlaps, but only for blocks in elf memory)
3 : Build Dynarec block bigger (continue when block overlaps, for all types of memory)

Simulation of Strong Memory model

0 : Don\'t try anything special
1 : Enable some Memory Barrier when writing to memory (on some MOV opcode)
2 : All 1 plus a Memory Barrier on every write to memory using MOV
3 : All 2 plus Memory Barrier when reading from memory and on some SSE/SSE2 opcodes

Tweak memory barriers to reduce performance impact of strong memory emulation

0 : Use regular safe barriers
1 : Use weak barriers for mild performance boost
2 : Use weak barriers, additionally disable last write barriers

Generate aligned atomics only (only available on Arm64 for now).

0 : Generate unaligned atomics handling code.
1 : Generate aligned atomics only, which is faster and smaller code size, but will cause SIGBUS for LOCK prefixed opcodes operating on aligned data addresses.

Enable or disable the use of deferred flags.

0 : Disable the use of deferred flags.
1 : Enable the use of deferred flags.

Allow continue running a block that is unprotected and potentially dirty.

0 : Do not allow continue running a block that is unprotected and potentially dirty.
1 : Allow continue to run a dynablock that write data in the same page as code. It can gets faster in loading time of some game but can also get unexpected crashes.
2 : Will also, when it detect an HotPage, flag that page as NEVERCLEAN, and so it will not be write protected but Block build from that page will always be tested. It can be faster that way (but some SMC case might not be trapped).

Enable or disable the use of native flags.

0 : Do not use native flags.
1 : Use native flags when possible.

Enable x86 PAUSE emulation, may help the performance of spinlocks.

0 : Ignore x86 PAUSE instruction.
1 : Use YIELD to emulate x86 PAUSE instruction.
2 : Use WFI to emulate x86 PAUSE instruction.
3 : Use SEVL+WFE to emulate x86 PAUSE instruction.

AVX and AVX2 implemented, along with BMI1, BMI2, ADX, FMA, F16C and RDANDR extension!

0 : Disable AVX extension
1 : enable AVX, BMI1, F16C and VAES extension.
2 : All 1 plus enable AVX2, BMI2, FMA, ADX,VPCLMULQDQ and RDRAND.
\
Maximum number of CPUs presented to programs by box64
Detect UnityPlayer.dll and apply strongmem settings
Force every memory allocation in 32bit address spaces
Defines the max allowed forward value when building Block
Defines whether or not Dynarec will wait for the FillBlock to be ready
Enables TSO IR ops (required for multithreaded apps).
Makes vector load/stores atomic when TSO is enabled.
Uses half-barrier atomics for unaligned loads/stores under TSO.
Makes REP MOVS / REP STOS atomic under TSO.
Enables multiblock code compilation. Can cause longer JIT compilation and stutter.
Uses volatile metadata from PE files for TSO when available.
Special SMC + JIT block hacks for Mono detection.
Hides CPUID hypervisor bit (useful for apps that crash with it).
Disables FEXCore JIT L2 cache lookup, saving memory but introducing stutters.
Switches FEXCore JIT L1 cache to be dynamically sized, saving memory but introducing stutters.
Emulates X87 floating point using 64-bit precision. This reduces emulation accuracy and may result in rendering bugs.
Maximum instruction budget per translation block. Higher values can improve performance but may reduce stability.
Please select the folder containing the game files you want to add as a custom game.
Are you sure you want to remove driver "%s"? This cannot be undone
Only use if you get \'Application Load Error\'. May reduce FPS.
Only enable if DLCs are not detected or saves with DLC are not working
Reduces performance and slows down launch\nAllows online play and fixes DRM and controller issues\nNot all games work
Updates Steam to the latest version. Significantly reduces performance.
Disabling may fix graphical glitches on some devices
View, modify, and create FEXCore presets
Direct touch-to-cursor movement (ON) vs touchpad-style relative movement (OFF)
On-screen controls will be hidden when the game starts. Toggle via the navigation menu.
Left stick = WASD, Right stick = mouse. L2 = left click, R2 = right click.

Hide Android status bar in game list, settings, etc. App will restart when changed.

It would be nice to know about the recent issue you've had.
You can view and export the most recent crash log in the app's settings and attach it as a Github issue in the project's repository.
Link to the Github repo is also in settings!
